name: spansnchi

body.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(cspn, csn(c0)), cch)
-| wcel(c0, chba)
-| wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(cspn, csn(c0)), cch))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(cspn, csn(c0)), cch)
-| wcel(c0, chba)
-| wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(cspn, csn(c0)), cch))

comment: The span of a singleton in Hilbert space is a closed subspace. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
